price: 30. Sungguh, pada (kejadian) itu benar-benar terdapat tanda-tanda (kebesaran Allah); dan sesungguhnya Kami benar-benar menimpakan siksaan (kepada kaum Nuh itu).
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
